forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Isolated Snow Showers then Partly Sunny

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Snow Showers And Patchy Blowing Snow

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Snow Showers And Patchy Blowing Snow

Nubs Nob.conditions: Best conditions of the year on the upper Red and Blue loops ! Thank you Mother Nature , Nubs Nob , and John Baker . It was like skiing on butter .

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are covered in snow this morning. We plan to power till and groom all trails by the afternoon.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM
nubsNob.comments: BOOM! A surprise lake effect snow storm came in this morning and left us with 9" of fresh snow! The Grooming Crew is doing a second groom this morning to make it possible to move around the ski area. Much of the fresh snow will be left untouched on the steep runs. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Make it a great POWDER DAY at Nub's Nob.
